title: Client constantly crashing on Login
body:
I left the client on the login screen for 5 minutes - maybe less - as i browsed twitter (Im addicted, don't judge me) and all of a sudden i get a BugSplat appear up on my screen. I sit there dazed for a minute as I thought to myself "Wha... I forgot I even had that opened." Then another popped up... and another... Then I realized the client kept relaunching itself and kept constantly crashing. I wasn't even able to log in or do anything...

I would do the in-client repair service but I can't even get past the client loading without it crashing. I've tried Uninstalling and Reinstalling but that didn't help either. I used the Hextech Repair Service and it's basically the same thing. The only thing that It really did for me was give me a folder of logs... What am I suppose to do? I need my fix of League man... {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: There is bug with Discord causing clients to bugsplat. I can't confirm the real cause of this. All I know is whenever Discord is open, client will get bugged.

OMFG ty so much, i was confused as hell i even uninstalled the game and when i tried to reinstall it, it did the same thing. Edit: i did a little more research its specifically the overlay feature, if you turn that off then launch the game its fine.
Woke up to the same problem. Thx, disabling overlay worked perfectly.{{item:3682}}
I have the same problem but if Riot can fix it, it could be better for us. I like using discord when i'm playing League and i really want talking with my mates while playing.

If you didn't see the other comments, you can still use Discord while playing, just be sure to go into your discord settings and turn off the overlay. 

I should've expected it honestly considering it's a beta feature but I didnt even think that would be the cause. I don't think it's a riot problem but moreso a Discord problem
As others have mentioned, disabling Discord Overlay should resolve this!
